Detailed Description

Stores incomplete events.

Uses a map of I2OChains to store incomplete events.

Definition at line 21 of file FragmentStore.h.

Member Function Documentation

bool FragmentStore::addFragment ( I2OChain &  chain  ) 

Adds fragments of the I2OChain to the fragment store.

If the passed fragments completes an event, it returns true. In this case, the passed I2OChain contains the completed event.
